sentences.en: a London-based importer of Italian goods
sentences.cn: 设在伦敦的意大利产品进口商

sentences.en: An importer can endorse the BL and sell the goods even before they arrive.
sentences.cn: 进口商可以在提货单背面签字,在货物到岸之前就可以把货物卖出去.

sentences.en: As an importer, we think against documents is safer.
sentences.cn: 作为进口商, 我们认为凭单付款更为安全.

sentences.en: He is the sole importer of this product, and he certainly thinks he's onto a winner.
sentences.cn: 作为该产品唯一的进口商, 他当然觉得销路一定很好.

sentences.en: Importer : Thank you. I see your computer is fully IBM compatible.
sentences.cn: 谢谢. 我发明你们的电脑可以和IBM纯粹相容.

sentences.en: Japan is the biggest importer of U.S. beef.
sentences.cn: 日本是美国牛肉的最大进口国。

sentences.en: Large fastener importer seeking a Mechanical Plating Quality Engineer.
sentences.cn: 大型的螺丝进口商欲招聘机械镀锌区域质检工程师.

sentences.en: The bank cannot be reimbursed by the exporter if the importer fails to pay.
sentences.cn: 如果进口商不付款,则银行不能向出口商追偿款额.

sentences.en: The bar , created by perfume importer Cithera, only displays the perfumes.
sentences.cn: 它的创立者是香水进口商西塔罗.他在这里仅仅陈列所有的香水.

sentences.en: The importer deposits money in a blocked account.
sentences.cn: 进口商将钱存入冻结帐户.

sentences.en: They do the work without charge to the importer.
sentences.cn: 他们只是不向进口商收取费用.

sentences.en: We are importer for motorcycle & motor spare parts for Nigeria market.
sentences.cn: 为尼日利亚市场 采购 汽车和摩托车的发电机等配件,请供应商们联系我们.

sentences.en: We are not the sole importer of any goods in our district.
sentences.cn: 咱们在本地区是唯一进口这类商品的.

sentences.en: We are the main importer of Auto Filter for cars trucks.
sentences.cn: 我们主要进口汽车和卡车的滤清器,如果有好的价格,我们将马上下单.

sentences.en: We are the sole importer of these goods in our district.
sentences.cn: 我们在本地区是唯一进口这类商品的.

sentences.en: We wish to introduce ourselves as a reliable importer of textiles.
sentences.cn: 兹自我介绍,我们是一家可信赖的纺织品进口商.

words.tran_cn: 进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性

trans.tran_en: a person, company, or country that buys goods from other countries so they can be sold in their own country
